# canJoinAllSpaces

**Type Property**

The window can appear in all spaces.

## Declaration

```swift
static var canJoinAllSpaces: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior { get }
```

## Discussion

The menu bar behaves this way.

## Spaces

- **moveToActiveSpace**: When the window becomes active, move it to the active space instead of switching spaces.
